00012 #include "lcio.h"

00019 // using namespace lcio ;
00020 
00021 namespace CALICE {
00022 
00028 enum ETcmtConnectionFloatType {kNTcmtConnectionFloats};
00029 enum ETcmtConnectionIntType {
00030   kTcmtConnectionIntCrate,
00031   kTcmtConnectionIntElecID,  // 0xAABBCCDD, where AA=slot, BB=fe, CC=chip, DD=channel
00032   kTcmtConnectionIntFastID,  // 0x0000MMSS, where MM=moduleID and SS=StripID
00033   kTcmtConnectionIntIndexOfLowerLeftCell,
00034   kTcmtConnectionIntModuleType,
00035   kNTcmtConnectionInts
00036 };
00037 
00043 class TcmtConnection
00044   : public LCFixedObject<kNTcmtConnectionInts,kNTcmtConnectionFloats,0>
00045 {
00046 public:
00047   TcmtConnection()
00048     : LCFixedObject<kNTcmtConnectionInts,kNTcmtConnectionFloats,0>() { };
00049 
00052   TcmtConnection(LCObject* obj)
00053     : LCFixedObject<kNTcmtConnectionInts,kNTcmtConnectionFloats,0>(obj) { }
00054 
00055   TcmtConnection& setCrate(int crate_number) {
00056     obj()->setIntVal(kTcmtConnectionIntCrate, crate_number);
00057     return *this;
00058   };
00059 
00060   int getCrate() const {
00061     return getIntVal(kTcmtConnectionIntCrate);
00062   };
00063 
00064   TcmtConnection& setElecID(int elecID) {
00065     obj()->setIntVal(kTcmtConnectionIntElecID, elecID);
00066     return *this;
00067   };
00068   int getElecID() const {
00069     return getIntVal(kTcmtConnectionIntElecID);
00070   };
00071 
00072   TcmtConnection& setFastID(int fastID) {
00073     obj()->setIntVal(kTcmtConnectionIntFastID, fastID);
00074     return *this;
00075   };
00076   int getFastID() const {
00077     return getIntVal(kTcmtConnectionIntFastID);
00078   };
00079 
00080   TcmtConnection& setSlot(int slot) {
00081     assert( slot>=0 && slot<256);
00082     unsigned int newElecID = (this->getElecID() & 0x00FFFFFF) | (slot << 24);
00083     this->setElecID( newElecID );
00084     return *this;
00085   };
00086   int getSlot() const {
00087     return (this->getElecID() >> 24) & 0xff;
00088   };
00089 
00090   TcmtConnection& setFrontEnd(int fe) {
00091     assert( fe>=0 && fe<256);
00092     unsigned int newElecID = (this->getElecID() & 0xFF00FFFF) | (fe << 16);
00093     this->setElecID( newElecID );
00094     return *this;
00095   };
00096   int getFrontEnd() const {
00097     return (this->getElecID() >> 16) & 0xff;
00098   };
00099 
00100   TcmtConnection& setChip(int chip) {
00101     assert( chip>=0 && chip<256);
00102     unsigned int newElecID = (this->getElecID() & 0xFFFF00FF) | (chip << 8);
00103     this->setElecID( newElecID );
00104     return *this;
00105   };
00106   int getChip() const {
00107     return (this->getElecID() >> 8) & 0xff;
00108   };
00109 
00110   TcmtConnection& setChannel(int channel) {
00111     assert( channel>=0 && channel<256);
00112     unsigned int newElecID = (this->getElecID() & 0xFFFFFF00) | channel;
00113     this->setElecID( newElecID );
00114     return *this;
00115   };
00116   int getChannel() const {
00117     return this->getElecID() & 0xff;
00118   };
00119 
00123   TcmtConnection &  setIndexOfLowerLeftCell(unsigned int index_offset)
00124   {
00125     obj()->setIntVal(kTcmtConnectionIntIndexOfLowerLeftCell, index_offset);
00126     return *this;
00127   };
00128 
00132   int getIndexOfLowerLeftCell() const
00133   {
00134 #ifdef RECO_DEBUG
00135     std::cout << "Index: " << getIntVal(kTcmtConnectionIntIndexOfLowerLeftCell) << std::endl;
00136 #endif
00137     return getIntVal(kTcmtConnectionIntIndexOfLowerLeftCell);
00138   };
00139 
00140 
00146   TcmtConnection&  setModuleType(unsigned char type)
00147   {
00148     obj()->setIntVal(kTcmtConnectionIntModuleType, (int) type);
00149     return *this;
00150   };
00151 
00157   unsigned char getModuleType() const
00158   {
00159     return static_cast<unsigned char>(getIntVal(kTcmtConnectionIntModuleType));
00160   };
00161 
00167   TcmtConnection& setModuleID(int module_id)
00168   {
00169     assert( module_id>=0 && module_id<256);
00170     unsigned int newFastID = (this->getFastID() & 0xFFFF00FF) | (module_id << 8);
00171     this->setFastID( newFastID );
00172     return *this;
00173   };
00174 
00178   int getModuleID() const
00179   {
00180     return (this->getFastID() >> 8) & 0xff;
00181   };
00182 
00185   TcmtConnection& setStripID(int strip) {
00186     assert( strip>=0 && strip<=19);
00187     unsigned int newFastID = (this->getFastID() & 0xFFFFFF00) | strip;
00188     this->setFastID( newFastID );
00189     return *this;
00190   };
00194   int getStripID() const {
00195     return this->getFastID() & 0xff;
00196   };
00197 
00198   int getConnectorType() const {
00199     return 0;
00200   }
00201 
00202   // -------- need to implement abstract methods from LCGenericObject
00203 
00206   const std::string getTypeName() const {
00207     return std::string("TcmtConnection");
00208   };
00209 
00212   const std::string getDataDescription() const {
00213     std::stringstream message;
00214     message << "i[" << kNTcmtConnectionInts << "]: crate, elecID, fastID, module type, lowerLeftID";
00215     return message.str();
00216   };
00217 
00218 }; // class
00219 
00220   inline std::ostream& operator<<( std::ostream& os, const TcmtConnection& me ) {
00221     os << me.getCrate()
00222        <<"/"<< me.getSlot()
00223        <<"/"<< me.getFrontEnd()
00224        <<"/"<< me.getChip()
00225        <<"/"<< me.getChannel()
00226        <<" ("<< std::hex << me.getElecID() << std::dec <<")"
00227        <<" -> ("<< std::hex << me.getFastID() << std::dec <<")"
00228        <<" "<< (me.getIndexOfLowerLeftCell() >> 24)
00229        <<"/"<< me.getModuleID()
00230        <<"/"<< me.getStripID()
00231        <<"/"<< (unsigned)me.getModuleType()
00232        <<"\t"<< me.getIndexOfLowerLeftCell();
00233     return os;
00234   }
